advertisement

For those interested in exploring The Best Places Youve Never Seen or discovering what the meaning is of This Is Penn State look no further PERIOD

Students faculty and staff may find these answers at the Penn State University Press companys annual book sale PERIOD The final day of the twoday sale is today from  a.m PERIOD until  p.m PERIOD in the Kern Building PERIOD

 Heather Smith Penn State Press publicity manager said PERIOD

The sale provides an opportunity for Penn State faculty staff and students to purchase books printed by the Penn State Press at a  percent discount PERIOD

This years sale also marks the fiftieth anniversary of the Penn State Press which was established in  as a part of the university Smith said PERIOD

Penn State Press editorial assistant Cali Buckley a  Penn State graduate said the book sale attracted several people yesterday with sales totaling more than  PERIOD

Buckley said the company is a scholarly publisher which only allows it to do smaller book runs printing from  to  copies of a single book at a time PERIOD Larger trade publishers such as Penguin Group have wider audiences and are able to print more than  books at once PERIOD

 Buckley said PERIOD

Buckley suggested the book The Best Places Youve Never Seen Pennsylvanias Small Museums A Travelers Guide by Therese Boyd as a possible holiday gift PERIOD

 Buckley said PERIOD 

Patty Mitchell production and journals coordinator for Penn State Press said the book sale is a team project put on by the Penn State Press outreach committee PERIOD The committee creates opportunities for university and community service activities for the company to get the word out about its products PERIOD

Mitchell also a graduate of Penn State manned the book sale for most of the day yesterday PERIOD She said yesterdays sales exceeded the amount of sales from firstday sales in previous years PERIOD

 Mitchell said PERIOD

As a possible gift idea for a Penn State graduate student or enthusiast Mitchell suggested the regional book This Is Penn State An Insiders Guide to the University Park Campus written by the staff of the Penn State Press along with Penn State staff members PERIOD

For the hunter in the family Mitchell also suggested the book Deer Wars Science Tradition And the Battle over Managing Whitetails in Pennsylvania a regional book by Bob Frye that comes with a complimentary orange hat PERIOD

For those who can not make time to peruse the book sale all books are available for purchase online at www.psupress.org PERIOD

Faculty staff and students each receive a  percent discount off books ordered online or through the companys customer service department PERIOD

If youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
